description: Numbers with exactly 5 ones in binary expansion.
comments: Appears to give all n such that 4096 is the highest power of 2 dividing A005148(n). - _Benoit Cloitre_, Jun 22 2002A038447(n) = A007088(a(n)). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 06 2015
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (PARI) sum_of_bits(n) = if(n<1, 0, sum_of_bits(floor(n/2))+n%2)isA014313(n) = (sum_of_bits(n) == 5); \\ _Michael B. Porter_, Oct 21 2009(PARI) is(n)=hammingweight(n)==5 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Nov 17 2013(PARI) print1(t=2^5-1); for(i=2, 50, print1(", "t=A057168(t))) \\ _M. F. Hasler_, Aug 27 2014(Haskell)a014313 = f . a038447 where   f x = if x == 0 then 0 else 2 * f x' + b  where (x', b) = divMod x 10-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 06 2015
author: Al Black (gblack(AT)nol.net)
